publ: by Blue Cross Blue Shield of Michigan
name: MIBlueFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Make the newsroom any room in the house. Stay up-to-date on the latest news from Blue Cross Blue Shield of Michigan with Alexa’s Flash Briefing.

Search for MIBlue Flash Briefing, then enable the Skill. Check the Flash Briefing settings in your Alexa app to make sure MIBlue is toggled on.

To get started, just say, “Alexa, what’s my Flash Briefing,” or “Alexa, what’s in the news?” and you’ll be tuned in to the latest health care news.

About Blue Cross:

Blue Cross Blue Shield of Michigan and Blue Care Network are nonprofit corporations and independent licensees of the Blue Cross and Blue Shield Association. We’re committed to delivering affordable health care products for businesses, individuals, and seniors. Beyond health care coverage, we provide impactful community initiatives, leadership in improving health care and innovation for the lives, families and workplaces of everyone in Michigan.

This Skill provides general educational information on health-related issues and provides access to health-related resources for the convenience of our users. This Skill and its health-related information and resources are not a substitute for professional medical advice or for the care that patients receive from their physicians or other health care providers. This Skill and its health-related information resources are not meant to be the practice of medicine, the practice of nursing, or to carry out any professional health care advice or service in the state where you live. Nothing in this Skill is to be used for medical or nursing diagnosis or professional treatment.

Always seek the advice of your physician or other licensed health care provider. Always consult your health care provider before beginning any new treatment, or if you have any questions regarding a health condition. You should not disregard medical advice, or delay seeking medical advice, because of something you heard in this Skill. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial 911.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
